Name: Beetroot & Vanilla Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Just as the name suggests, only the beetroot pervades this otherwise classic Daiquiri more than the vanilla. Consider using vanilla-infused rum.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2014 by Josh Powell at Bar44, Penarth, Wales.
Nutrition: One serving of Beetroot & Vanilla Daiquiri contains 173 calories
